Subskills.name: Steel Cutter
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by empire's slash.

Subskills.name: Destructive Force
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect of empire's slash.

Subskills.name: Unbridled Rage
Subskills.description: Perform a series of slashes in multiple directions after teleporting.

Subskills.name: Mastering The Sword
Subskills.description: Increases the attack speed of empire’s slash when wielding a 2-handed weapon.

Subskills.name: On The Mark
Subskills.description: Increases the attack rating when using empire's slash.

Subskills.name: Piercing Backslash
Subskills.description: Gain additional critical strike damage when using empire’s slash.

Subskills.name: Slithering Blade
Subskills.description: Gain additional critical strike chance when using empire’s slash.

Subskills.name: Muda Muda Muda Muda Muda
Subskills.description: Perform a huge attack covering the whole screen dealing high damage. Empire's slash no longer teleports you and now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Absorb Life
Subskills.description: Increases life steal when using empire's slash.

Subskills.name: Wounding Slash
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleed on hit.

Subskills.name: Time To Spare
Subskills.description: You no longer teleport a fixed distance. Teleport range increased.

Subskills.name: Bloodcovered Edge
Subskills.description: Monsters hit by empire's slash rebound an additional empire's slash towards a nearby monster. Empire's slash now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Cone Of Death
Subskills.description: Empire slash no longer teleports and attacks with multiple smaller slashes in a cone infront of you.
